exceptions.exn: The LHS of opp_plus (opp (plus _ _)) does not match any subterm of the goal
The LHS of opp_opp (opp (opp _)) does not match any subterm of the goal
The LHS of plus_comm (plus _ _) does not match any subterm of the goal

In environment K : Ring H : forall x y : ?G, opp (plus x y) = plus (opp x) (opp y) x : K H1 : forall x0 y : ?G1, opp (plus x0 y) = plus (opp x0) (opp y) H0 : forall x0 : ?G0, opp (opp x0) = x0 H4 : forall x0 y : ?G4, plus x0 y = plus y x0 H3 : forall x0 y : ?G3, opp (plus x0 y) = plus (opp x0) (opp y) H2 : forall x0 : ?G2, opp (opp x0) = x0 Unable to unify "mult (opp one) x" with "opp x".

original: unfold minus. rewrite opp_plus. rewrite opp_opp. rewrite plus_comm. reflexivity.
